name: Due Diligence
description: Investment/company due diligence: financials, risks, team, traction.
strategy: 1) SEC EDGAR for filings. 2) News and press. 3) LinkedIn/careers for team. 4) Product reviews and sentiment. 5) Competitor comparison.
synthesis_instructions: Include: financial snapshot, risks, team quality signals, traction metrics, and red flags. Rate confidence per section.
